_param_list.name: enabled
_param_list.hint: Toggle whether or not tool is active

allowed_values.alpha_beta_target: Reach target brightness using linear transformation
allowed_values.gamma_target: Reach target brightness using gamma correction

allowed_values.if_under: If image brightness is below target
allowed_values.if_over: If image brightness is over target

_param_list.name: alpha_gamma
_param_list.hint: Alpha value for linear transformation, gamma for gamma correction

_param_list.name: show_over_under
_param_list.desc: Show over an under exposed parts

_param_list.name: text_overlay
_param_list.desc: Overlay text on top of images
_param_list.hint: Draw description text on top of images

_param_list.name: roi_type

allowed_values.crop: Crop image to ROI (most tools don not support this option)
allowed_values.erode: Erode region inside ROI - mask only
allowed_values.dilate: Dilate region inside ROI - mask only
allowed_values.open: Open region inside ROI - mask only
allowed_values.close: Close region inside ROI - mask only

_param_list.hint: no clue

_param_list.name: roi_shape

allowed_values.circle: Circle, will be treated as rectangle for morphology

_param_list.hint: no clue

_param_list.name: tool_target
_param_list.hint: no clue

_param_list.name: source_file

allowed_values.cropped_source: source cropped to keep ROI (if available)
allowed_values.source_median: source with median filter (5 if not set)

_param_list.hint: no clue

_param_list.name: min_radius
_param_list.hint: All circles smaller than this will be ignored

_param_list.name: max_radius
_param_list.hint: All circles bigger than this will be ignored

_param_list.name: step_radius
_param_list.hint: Steps for scanning radius

_param_list.name: max_peaks
_param_list.hint: Keeps only n best circles

_param_list.name: min_distance
_param_list.hint: Remove circles that are too close

_param_list.name: keep_only_one
_param_list.desc: Keep only closest, if not, ROI is larger circle

_param_list.name: target_position
_param_list.desc: Keep the closest circle closest to

_param_list.name: canny_sigma
_param_list.hint: Sigma.

_param_list.name: canny_first
_param_list.hint: First threshold for the hysteresis procedure.

_param_list.name: canny_second
_param_list.hint: Second threshold for the hysteresis procedure.

_param_list.name: threshold
_param_list.hint: Threshold for kernel based operators

_param_list.name: enabled
_param_list.hint: Toggle whether or not tool is active

_param_list.name: grey_zone_limit
_param_list.desc: Grey if more than x apart:
_param_list.hint: How little different must the 3 components be to be considered grey

_param_list.name: source_brightness

allowed_values.cropped_source: source cropped to keep ROI (if available)
allowed_values.source_median: source with median filter (5 if not set)

_param_list.hint: no clue

allowed_values.average_as_lower: Use average brightness as underexposed threshold
allowed_values.average_as_upper: Use average brightness as overexposed threshold

_param_list.name: avg_weight
_param_list.desc: Apply x factor to auto threshold

_param_list.name: text_overlay
_param_list.desc: Overlay text on top of images
_param_list.hint: Draw description text on top of images

_param_list.name: enabled
_param_list.hint: Toggle whether or not tool is active

_param_list.name: text_overlay
_param_list.desc: Overlay text on top of images
_param_list.hint: Draw description text on top of images

_param_list.name: build_mosaic
_param_list.hint: If true edges and result will be displayed side by side

_param_list.name: background_color
_param_list.hint:
Color to be used when printing masked image.
 if "None" is selected standard mask will be printed.

_param_list.name: delete_all_bellow
_param_list.hint: The more small contours are delete, the faster the algorithm

_param_list.name: split_plant_name
_param_list.desc: Split plant name into multiple variables

_param_list.name: new_column_names
_param_list.hint: names separate by "," with no spaces

_param_list.name: quantile_color
_param_list.desc: Select amount of quantiles for color analysis

_param_list.name: quantile_width
_param_list.desc: Select amount of quantiles for width analysis

_param_list.name: bound_level
_param_list.hint: Horizontal bound normally used to separate above from below ground

_param_list.name: pseudo_channel
_param_list.desc: Channel used for pseudo color images
_param_list.hint: Select channel for pseudo color image

_param_list.name: pseudo_background_type
_param_list.desc: Background type for pseudo color images
